role.name: /RESET
role.descr: Reset pin for MCU, active at low.

role.name: AIN0
role.descr: Analog Comparator Positive Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the positive input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: MOSI
role.descr: Data input pin for memory downloading or SPI.

role.name: AIN1
role.descr: Analog Comparator Negative Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the negative input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: MISO
role.descr: Data output pin for memory uploading or SPI.

role.name: OC1A
role.descr: Output compare matchA output: The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output com-pareA. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC1A pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: SCK
role.descr: Clock input pin for memory up/downloading or SPI.

role.name: INT0
role.descr: External Interrupt source 0 to the MCU.
